about_the_game:
Step into a world where every move could be your last. Navigate eerie mazes shrouded in fog, evade deadly traps, and outwit relentless ghosts. Can you collect all the crystals and reach the exit before the shadows catch you?

Game Features:

  • Two unique modes: Play through a multi-level campaign or challenge yourself in procedurally generated worlds, where every maze is a new adventure.

  • Survival and suspense: Limited visibility, dynamic lighting, and a mystical fog will keep you on edge every moment.

  • Hardcore mode: First-person perspective, restricted view, and realistic movement mechanics immerse you in an intense horror experience.

  • Intelligent enemies: Ghosts patrol the labyrinth and will chase you if you enter their line of sight.

Experience true fear as you traverse dark corridors. Only by collecting every crystal can you unlock the path to freedom. Are you ready to face the challenge?

short_description: FOG - A horror game set in a foggy labyrinth where you must collect crystals, avoid ghosts and traps to escape. Limited visibility, a dark atmosphere, and minimalist graphics create intense suspense. You’ll face a large number of unique mazes with increasing difficulty.
